Description: Create a swirling maelstrom of molten lava and boiling water, trapping and incinerating everything within.
Summon a wave of lava and boiling water that flows over the battlefield, solidifying into burning rock.
Cause an earthquake that cracks open the ground, releasing boiling water and molten lava to scald enemies.
Summon a mudslide of molten rock and boiling water, burying and burning everything in its path.
Unleash the fury of fire, water, and earth to create a cataclysm that annihilates the battlefield.
